data.why:
I'm currently considering doing a module probably called
    Text::CapitalizeTitle which would attempt to apply english title
    capitalization rules to an arbitrary string (if the author of
    Text::Capitalize is interested in patches, however, I might skip
    this).

    The other thing I'm working on is a module to access the slocate
    database on unix box directly (without using the command-line
    "locate").
